name: Daemon Drifter
description:
Race the same map over and over again with the goal to get the best time! After your first lap, a ghost car will come into play and rerun your best lap. Each time you beat it, it will replace it's path with your new best lap. Keep racing, and see how much you can lower the time!

Daemon Drifter is in on-going development, and will be released as a full-game in the future.

Controls:

W A S D - Control the car

SPACE - Handbrake

ESCAPE - Pause
